channel.title: Dips on Lam Family Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Dips on Lam Family Cookbook

item.title: Garlic & Coconut Dukka
item.description: Ingredients 45 g sesame seeds 90 g raw almonds 20 g granulated garlic 25 g dessicated coconut 5 g Cumin Seeds Whole 5 g coriander seeds Whole 1 tsp ground sea salt Method Place sesame, almonds, garlic, coconut, cumin and coriander into TMX.

item.title: Sage & Lemon Salt
item.description: Ingredients 900g Himalayan salt 2 handful sage leaves zest of 3 lemons Method Dehydrate sage leaves & lemon zest overnight. Blend in TM (20sec on sp8). Add salt & blend again.

item.title: Garlic and Herb Dip
item.description: Original image filename: Garlic_and_herb_dip.jpg Ingredients Small bunch fresh Parsley 1 small clove garlic 2 shallots/spring onions 250g cream cheese 2 tbls yoghurt, or 10â€“20 g Milk (optional) Method Place parsley, garlic and shallots/spring onions into TM bowl.

item.title: Guacamole
item.description: Ingredients 2 parts Avocado 1 part Sour cream Sweet chilli sauce to taste Salt and cracked pepper (optional) Method Mix avocado and sour cream. Top with sweet chilli sauce, just a thin film.
